titles.title: A resolution designating the week of November 6 through November 12, 2012, as "Veterans' Education Awareness Week."

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 11/18/2011--Introduced. Designates the week of November 6-12, 2011, as Veterans Education Awareness Week in order to raise public awareness about: (1) the Post-9/11 Veterans Educational Assistance Act of 2008 (the Act), (2) the educational benefits to which veterans are entitled, and (3) the resources available to help veterans maximize educational benefits under the Act.
